name: Coffee Rush Hour
description:
Coffee Hour Rush is a roguelike game where you progress through random floors as a beaver with a gun to satisfy the out of control customers in the sewers!  Plow through enemies with a nice selection of guns and deliver all six ingredients to the coffee maker to make the coffee!

Move with WASD or arrow keys.

Q to swap weapons, walk up to a new weapon and right click to pick it up.

Left click to shoot your weapon, and to reload.

Walk up to a glowing ingredient to pick it up, go onto the coffee maker to add it.

When you place six, you get a finished coffee which you bring to the customers!

Have fun!

Requiring coffee.
